member.name: M:ModbusRTU.modbusrtu.Open(System.String,System.Int32,System.IO.Ports.Parity)
member.summary: Open Port COM , alway Databit = 8 , StopBits = One. Phún Quốc Việt - 0344960322
member.param: portName is COM Serial
baudRate of COM ,recommend is 9600
parity of COM , recommend is None
